name: todoist_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Todoist in parallel. Each query opens a separate tab, triggers the search dialog, types the query, and extracts results.

detailSteps.code: const searchBtn = document.querySelector('[aria-label="Search"], button[class*="search"], a[href*="search"], [data-testid="search"]'); if (searchBtn) { searchBtn.click(); } else { document.dispatchEvent(new KeyboardEvent('keydown', { key: '/', code: 'Slash', keyCode: 191, bubbles: true })); } return { opened: true };
detailSteps.name: open_search
detailSteps.label: Open search

detailSteps.code: const hash = window.location.hash || ''; const qMatch = hash.match(/__q=([^&]*)/); const query = qMatch ? decodeURIComponent(qMatch[1]) : ''; const input = document.querySelector('input[type="search"], input[placeholder*="Search"], input[placeholder*="search"], [role="combobox"], [data-testid="search-input"], dialog input, [class*="search"] input'); if (input && query) { input.focus(); input.value = ''; document.execCommand('insertText', false, query); input.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true })); } return { typed: !!input, query };
detailSteps.name: type_query
detailSteps.label: Type query

detailSteps.code: const tasks = []; document.querySelectorAll('.task_list_item, [class*="task_list_item"], [data-testid="task"], [class*="search"] li, [class*="result"] [class*="task"]').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 20) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('.task_content, [class*="task_content"], [data-testid="task-name"], [class*="content"]'); const dueEl = el.querySelector('.due_date, [class*="due"], time, [class*="date"]'); const prioEl = el.querySelector('[class*="priority"]'); tasks.push({ name: nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', due_date: dueEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', priority: prioEl?.className?.match(/priority_(\d)/)?.[1] || prioEl?.getAttribute('data-priority') || '' }); } }); return { task_count: tasks.length, tasks: tasks.filter(t => t.name) };
detailSteps.name: results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
